ballSim
Class BallSim

java.lang.Object
  ballSim.BallSim
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class BallSim
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable

BallSim is the main class of the BallSim project. It runs a graphical simulation of some balls bouncing down a set of steps. Many parameters can be adjusted by the user via a GUI.

Version:
2 (17/11/2010) Based on a simple project called 'BallDemo' originally written by Michael Kolling and David J. Barnes, for the book 'Objects First with Java A practical Introduction Using BlueJ' (23Jan2002).
Author:
Robin Smith
